title: for sale/trade: t206 lajoie bat psa 3.5

posts.post_title: for sale/trade: t206 lajoie bat psa 3.5
posts.post_content:
just got another from eric (great 2.5 eric thanks!)...

this 3.5 is $275 shipped check/mo.  would prefer trade for other t206 hof action shots if you have them, in need of a speaker or johnson the most...check my list in another post.
